text: Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o11 pages LaTeX, 1 table, 2 pseudo-programs; previous version published in Proc 16th International Symposium on DIStributed Computing (DISC 2002), Lecture Notes in Computer Science, Vol 2508, Springer-Verlag, Berlin,
118-132. New version eliminates error in the protocol (merges a split scan operation that proved problematic) and defers the formal proof to a planned future I/O automaton version\u00a7r
